comment.body: good luck with bringing more people here! will there be a video published online afterwards?

Yassssssss. I think that is precisely what ol' TBL called for with his talk on the origin of the web: data decentralization + federation based on protocols and content types. I called it Dataisland back in the days.

Oh wellâ€¦

I don't know about the rest of Italy, but Rome for me has always been the place where I periodically re-convinced myself _some_ humans have produced _some_ stuff with _some_ worth.

And maybe when you get back there will be some [libzeronet](/libzeronet.bit/) I/O routines to benchmark against the Python stack. ;-)
YASSSS to this. Especially compression. One question, however: you recommend 7-zip but LZMA (7z, tar.xz) archives are not supported yet?
